urlText: Central Station: Suburban Tunnel temporarily closed
content:
From Monday 20 April until Sunday 31 May, the Suburban Tunnel at Central Station will be temporarily closed due to Sydney Metro works.

To access Platforms 16 to 23 please follow signs and use the Northern Concourse or Southern Tunnel.
subtitle: Central Station: Suburban Tunnel temporarily closed

urlText: Town Hall Station, Platform 4 escalator maintenance
content:
From 5pm Saturday 2 May until Sunday 7 June, at Town Hall Station, the escalator at the northern end of Platform 4 will be closed for maintenance.

Please follow the signs and staff directions to the nearest escalators, stairs or lift to get on and off the platform. If you need further assistance, please see station staff or call 9379 4110.
subtitle: Town Hall Station, Platform 4 escalator maintenance

properties.speechText: From 5 PM Saturday 2 May to Sunday 7 June, at Town Hall Station, the escalator at the northern end of Platform 4 will be closed for maintenance.

urlText: Town Hall Station escalator outage between the northern end of platform 4 and concourse
content:
The escalator between the platform 4 and the concourse is temporarily out of service.  Please use the nearby stairs or lift.

If you require assistance, please call staff at Town Hall Station on 9379 4110.

This escalator is expected to be back in service by __________.
subtitle: Town Hall Station escalator outage between the northern end of platform 4 and concourse

urlText: Central Station: Changes to Platform 16 and 17
content:
From 18 May 2020 there will be changes to Platforms 16 and 17 at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works.

Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work will move from the middle of the platform to the southern end of the platform. Temporary concrete ramps will be built to connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete floor surface areas.

For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.

If you are travelling to Central Station and require assistance to alight from Platforms 16 and 17, please board via the front door of the fourth train carriage.

For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works, visit sydneymetro.info.
subtitle: Central Station: Changes to Platform 16 and 17
